title: FDA Approves RSV Vaccine to Pass Protection From Mother to Child
author: Jared S Hopkins
description: Doctors expect tens of thousands fewer infant hospitalizations because of new RSV tools.
cleaned_text: Updated Aug. 21, 2023 5:45 pm ET A vaccine that federal regulators approved on Monday could help make the most severe cases of [a dangerous respiratory illness in infants](https://www.wsj.com/articles/rsv-adults-kids-symptoms-hospital-11668721926?mod=article_inline) a thing of the past.
